mapper.select: select id, city_no, city_name, county_no, county_name, org_no, org_name, tg_no, tg_name from dws_elecon.relation where id = #{id}
select id, city_no, city_name, county_no, county_name, org_no, org_name, tg_no, tg_name from dws_elecon.relation where tg_no=#{tgNo}
select id, city_no, city_name, county_no, county_name, org_no, org_name, tg_no, tg_name from dws_elecon.relation limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into dws_elecon.relation(city_no, city_name, county_no, county_name, org_no, org_name, tg_no, tg_name) values (#{cityNo}, #{cityName}, #{countyNo}, #{countyName}, #{orgNo}, #{orgName}, #{tgNo}, #{tgName})

insert into dws_elecon.relation(city_no, city_name, county_no, county_name, org_no, org_name, tg_no, tg_name) values
(#{entity.cityNo}, #{entity.cityName}, #{entity.countyNo}, #{entity.countyName}, #{entity.orgNo}, #{entity.orgName}, #{entity.tgNo}, #{entity.tgName})

insert into dws_elecon.relation(city_no, city_name, county_no, county_name, org_no, org_name, tg_no, tg_name) values
(#{entity.cityNo}, #{entity.cityName}, #{entity.countyNo}, #{entity.countyName}, #{entity.orgNo}, #{entity.orgName}, #{entity.tgNo}, #{entity.tgName})
on duplicate key update city_no = values(city_no) , city_name = values(city_name) , county_no = values(county_no) , county_name = values(county_name) , org_no = values(org_no) , org_name = values(org_name) , tg_no = values(tg_no) , tg_name = values(tg_name)
mapper.update:
update dws_elecon.relation
city_no = #{cityNo},
city_name = #{cityName},
county_no = #{countyNo},
county_name = #{countyName},
org_no = #{orgNo},
org_name = #{orgName},
tg_no = #{tgNo},
tg_name = #{tgName},
where id = #{id}
